values:
& so i am in a crappy/sad mood again.

my birthday is on monday, & duhhh it's gonna suck, like always.
no one has any money, or is 21. & there's no clubs open.
so wtf.
there is nothing to do.

so that is why i say it's gonna suck, there's nada to do.

& this kid emmanuel,who lived in my neighborhood, & went to uhs found me on myspace & decided that he might go to kobe's with me & jasmine. sooo whatever. he asked me if i was seeing someone. ummmm. yeah. i dunno about that.

but, yeah & david.
always on my page.
constantly.
i guess reading my comments & shit & going to my friends page to see what i say back.

why does he still care? 

it's sad.
i know, i should "move on"

but, it still depresses me.

it still depresses me because he was my best guy friend, the one i told everything & anything to. 
i really did love him.
i fell hard for him.

i do miss him sometimes, why did he have to fuck it up?
i didn't want it to end.
but it had to.
he turned his back on me.

i miss him sometimes, i still don't understand why he would do that to me.
seeing as how he said i was his best friend too.
& his favorite girl out of all the girls he dated.

i never got an explanation of why.
why.
that's the only thing i wanna know.

why would he screw us over.
he get's mad cause i write shit about him on myspace.
& calls me cause he's pissed off.
all i wanna know is why.
i just loved him.

i think about it every single day.
everything, even the simplest things still remind me of him.

like today, i was doing men's department.
i saw these nice dress shirts he would like.
what's wrong with me?

i'm so sad.

i dunno anymore. 

this is really getting to me.

This is drama someone has started with meee so don't read if you don't want.

that was lower than low. but that's fine cuz now you will definetley be gone on all my friends list for sure, I will pretend that we have never met because YOU DON'T CARE ABOUT ME OR YOU WOULD NOT HAVE LEFT ME, PLUS YOU'RE APOLOGIES ARE NOT REAL. THEY'RE FAKE, SAYING THAT "I FEEL BAD CUZ YOU WALKED HOME" WHATEVER YOU SHOULD FEEL BAD BECAUSE YOU LEFT ME. PLEASE IF I TREATED YOU LIKE SHIT, I WOULD HAVE NOT BEEN SUCH A GOOD FRIEND TO YOU. YOU'RE THE ONE GOING AROUND TALKING SHIT ABOUT ALL MY BEST FRIENDS SAYING YOU "DONT LIKE THEM" THEN YOU FUCKIN LEAVE ME FOR THEM AND YOU ADD THEM ON ALL YOUR FRIENDS LIST, I GUESS TO MAKE YOU FEEL IMPORTANT OR SOMETHING. AND YOU ACT LIKE LIKE YOU'RE FRIENDS WITH THEM WHEN YOU'RE NOT. ACTUALLY TO TELL YOU THE TRUTH I THINK I AM A LOT MORE MATURE THAN YOU, YOU KNOW WHAT THEY SAY "THE GUYS DON'T GO AFTER THE BEST GIRLS" BUT, HEY THAT'S FINE THAT'S WHY I HAVE SOME OF YOUR EX'S AND PEOPLE WHO "LIKED YOU" LIKING ME?? OKAY WHATEVER.. PLUS, THE GUYS I KNOW. AND DON'T START ON THAT SHIT. WHATEVER WE ARE DONE, I DON'T EVER WANNA TALK TO YOU AGAIN, YOU'RE GOING TO BE REMOVED FROM MY FRIENDS LIST AND EVERYTHING ELSE. AND YOU CAN GET YOUR LITTLE FUCKIN ATTITUDES WITH ME BUT, KNOW I HAVE THEM TOO SO THAT'S FINE, oh and don't ever say you're a better best friend than anyone cuz you're not, or ever will be, or ever were. I KNOW YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND WHAT I HAVE BEEN THROUGH AND YOU DON'T CARE AND I DON'T CARE EITHER ANYMORE, BUT WHATEVER GOODBYE.
Please Comment To Let Me Know You Added Me :-D

So I have a My Space and now it's hott! Woo Hoo! Laura made it pretty for me!! Yayyyyyy! Thanks Loudaaaa I love you sooo much!! :-D 
(Mallory did my pics for me as well so thanks to mally too) 
I will post there soon.

I know a lot of you have a my space.. so if you do add me! Plus you can see me and dorky pics of me there. lol

go here:
http://www.myspace.com/16124017

wooo that seriously made my day. I was so darn annoyed. woooo! off to bug my mom for some taco bell.

Did you know that 30,000 people a day die in Africa?? And, a child dies every three seconds?? 

Sign the petition to end povety at http://www.live8live.com . It will make a difference. I found this to be brilliant, seeing as though we do live in the richest country in the world. If you saw Live 8 well, I hope you agree with me. Please sign. and thank you for your time. :-)

So this is random, but I took a few people off my friends list because either you don't ever comment, or I don't read your journal, you never update or what not, but there is 1 person that added me and I don't even know them, nor did they ask me to add them, or for them to add me. 
Take me off your list plz

There is more people I have in mind in cutting, but since some are friends from school, I didn't, yet.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY NIQUEA!!!!!!!! :-)

<3 ya!!
